dict.acceptation: 卖，出卖；销售额，销售；销路；拍卖；

sent.orig: The sale system has two kinds: trusting sale and second sale.
sent.trans: 出版流通机制分委托供销制和二次销售制两种。

sent.orig: Strict requirements have been focusing on product quality sale, sale, sale of customer service.
sent.trans: 一直以来严格要求产品质量同时注重售前，售间，售后的客户服务。

sent.orig: We provide customers, including pre-sale, sale, the sale a range of integrated services.
sent.trans: 竭诚为广大用户提供包括售前、售中、售后全方位的一体化服务。

sent.orig: Unique services for our users: We provide pro-sale, on-sale and post-sale integrated services.
sent.trans: 对客户的独特服务：售前、中、后一条龙服务。

sent.orig: I bought this in the sale or at the sale or in the january sale.
sent.trans: 我是在降价期间或一月份降价期内买这件物品。
